errors.cause: Authentication failure, branch not found, or network issue

solutions.code:
checkout([$class: 'GitSCM',
    branches: [[name: '*/main']],
    userRemoteConfigs: [[
        url: 'git@github.com:org/repo.git',
        credentialsId: 'github-ssh-key'
    ]]
])

git branch: 'main',  // Not 'refs/heads/main'
    url: 'https://...'
